Add the GeoCBI calculated from the burn grading data

Source: R/add_geocbi.R
add_geocbi.Rd

Add the GeoCBI calculated from the burn grading data

add_geocbi(burngrading)

Arguments

burngrading

A data.frame of burn grading data, collected with ODK Collect from the form "Burn Grading 0.1" and downloaded with ruODK::odata_submission_get(wkt=T).

Value

The input data.frame with an extra variable, 'geocbi'.

Examples

data("burngrading01")
data_with_geocbi <- add_geocbi(burngrading01)
names(data_with_geocbi)
#>  [1] "id"                              "observation_start_time"         
#>  [3] "reporter"                        "device_id"                      
#>  [5] "observation_end_time"            "submission_date"                
#>  [7] "submitter_id"                    "submitter_name"                 
#>  [9] "instance_id"                     "location_longitude"             
#> [11] "location_latitude"               "location_altitude"              
#> [13] "plot_photo"                      "plot_name"                      
#> [15] "homogeneous_burn_severity"       "s1_fcov_post_fire_leaf_fall"    
#> [17] "s1_area_unburnt"                 "s1_duff"                        
#> [19] "s1_coarse_fuel"                  "s1_photo"                       
#> [21] "s2_dominant_vegetation"          "s2_fcov"                        
#> [23] "s2_area_unburnt"                 "s2_grass_trees_with_skirts"     
#> [25] "s2_unburnt_shrub_density"        "s2_fcov_regenerating_plants"    
#> [27] "s2_photo"                        "s3_dominant_vegetation"         
#> [29] "s3_fcov"                         "s3_fcov_original_crown_intact"  
#> [31] "s3_density_bare_shrubs"          "s3_photo"                       
#> [33] "s4_dominant_vegetation"          "s4_fcov"                        
#> [35] "s4_avg_tree_height_m"            "s4_fcov_original_crown_intact"  
#> [37] "s4_resprouting_on_live_trees"    "s4_char_height"                 
#> [39] "s4_photo"                        "s5_dominant_vegetation"         
#> [41] "s5_fcov"                         "s5_avg_tree_height_m"           
#> [43] "s5_fcov_original_crown_intact"   "s5_no_trees_over_20cm_fallen"   
#> [45] "s5_resprouting_on_live_trees"    "s5_char_height"                 
#> [47] "s5_photo"                        "no_grass_trees"                 
#> [49] "no_hollow_logs"                  "no_standing_trees_gt20cm"
